ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced multimedia laptop with 16-inch screen (true 16:9 aspect ratio), Altec Lansing speakers
2.2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo T6600 processor, 250GB hard drive, 4 GB RAM (8 GB max), dual-layer DVD drive
Draft-N Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n); Fingerprint Reader; Gigabit Ethernet; Nvidia GeForce 9600M GT graphics
TV Tuner, 4 USB (with 1 shared eSATA), 1 FireWire, 1 HDMI, 1 VGA, ExpressCard 54/34, 5-in-1 memory card reader
Pre-installed with Windows Vista Home Premium with SP1. (Free upgrade to Windows 7 Home Premium upon request)
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion HDX16T 16.0-Inch 16:9 WSXGA Laptop (Intel Core 2 Duo T6600 at 2.2GHz, 4 GB RAM, 250GB Hard Drive, Fingerprint Reader, TV Tuner, Windows Vista Premium)
